Text: great torrent, works very well, easy mosy.. but only dont know how to get the game save.. any help?

@ TcaesarT  read description :
You will need an offline account for Windows-Games-Live to be able to save your progress.
If you do not have an Windows-Games-Live offline account you can get one from here:  

http://www.nosteam.ro/index.php?topic=464.msg5891#msg5891
